column4: Guys, my wife left me, I crashed my car, my cat died, my laptop is almost out of batteries and I have a headache.
You're now qualified to write a country song

Xchat, Settings -> Advanced -> URL Handlers.. add this as a command: !firefox -remote 'openURL(%s)'   That's what I have and firefox opens links from xchat when I right-click and choose "Open link in browser"
There's an "Open link in browser" sitting there that doe snothing.  :\
